name: ClassSkipper
0:
”Alexa, start class skipper”
”Please describe”
”Tell me more”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: class skipper
des: Have you ever thought about skipping class, but wondered if it would be ok to do so? The short answer, in most cases, is no. But if your struggling with the choice, now Alexa can help talk you through it.
